lines.text: Where have you been all day?
I went all the way to Poughkipsee...
Poughkipsee?
...yeah, and that ain't them.
[shows Ollie a box of Smith Brothers cough drops]
This is your son's baby.
Oh, blackmailers, huh?
[punches Ollie in the face]
What do we do with this stuff?
What do you think you do with it? Take it to the General.
Hey, how much would you charge me to haunt a house?
Well, looks like we're in it. Gee, I wish I could go.
Go where?
Why to war!
Why can't ya go?
There you are, I knew you'd take that selfish attitude. I'd go in a minute if it wasn't for my flat feet!
Why didn't you tell me it was you?
It was so dark, I didn't think you would hear me.

[to drill sergeant, after another troop has marched by in perfect unison]
Why don't you have *us* do like that?
Who are these gentlemen looking for?
Mr. Smith.
And where does he live?
Who?

[pointing out the window to the lunch wagon]
And is that part of your business?
Part of it? Why, that's *all* of it.

[laughs uproariously]
To lend you money on that, I'd have to be unconscious!
[last lines]
Well... if it ain't the snitchers.
[bends knife back causing it to make SFX]
I've got my knife.
[chases Laurel & Hardy]
